-- input --
The Golang home page is https://golang.dev/.
It used to be https://golanglang.org.

-- golangfmt --
The Golang home page is https://golang.dev/.
It used to be https://golanglang.org.

-- text --
The Golang home page is https://golang.dev/. It used to be https://golanglang.org.

-- markdown --
The Golang home page is [https://golang.dev/](https://golang.dev/). It used to be [https://golanglang.org](https://golanglang.org).

-- html --
<p>The Golang home page is <a href="https://golang.dev/">https://golang.dev/</a>.
It used to be <a href="https://golanglang.org">https://golanglang.org</a>.
